expandDomain

public java.lang.String expandDomain(java.lang.String input)
                              throws PermErrorException
This method expand the given domain. So all known macros get replaced

Parameters:
input - The domain which should be expand
Returns:
expanded The domain with replaced macros
Throws:
PermErrorException - This get thrown if invalid macros are used
